   20: -module(fprof_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: %% Test server framework exports
   25: -export([all/0, suite/0]).
   26: 
   27: %% Test suites
   28: -export([stack_seq/1, tail_seq/1, create_file_slow/1, spawn_simple/1,
   29:          imm_tail_seq/1, imm_create_file_slow/1, imm_compile/1,
   30:          cpu_create_file_slow/1, unicode/1, parsify_maps/1]).
   31: 
   32: %% Other exports
   33: -export([create_file_slow/2]).
   34: 
   35: %% Debug exports
   36: -export([parse/1, verify/2]).
   37: -export([spawn_simple_test/3]).
   38: 
   39: %-define(debug,true).
   40: -ifdef(debug).
   41: -define(dbg(Str,Args), io:format(Str,Args)).
   42: -else.
   43: -define(dbg(Str,Args), ok).
   44: -endif.
   45: 
   46: 
   47: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
   48: %%% Test suites
   49: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: 
   51: 
   52: suite() ->
   53:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   54:      {timetrap,{seconds,240}}].
   55: 
   56: all() ->
   57:     [stack_seq, tail_seq, create_file_slow, spawn_simple,
   58:      imm_tail_seq, imm_create_file_slow, imm_compile,
   59:      cpu_create_file_slow, unicode, parsify_maps].
   60: 
   61: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
   62: 
   63: %% Tests a stack recursive variant of lists:seq/3
   64: stack_seq(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   65:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   66:     TraceFile = filename:join(PrivDir,
   67:                               ?MODULE_STRING"_stack_seq.trace"),
   68:     AnalysisFile = filename:join(PrivDir,
   69:                                  ?MODULE_STRING"_stack_seq.analysis"),
   70:     Start = 1,
   71:     Stop = 1000,
   72:     Succ = fun (X) -> X + 1 end,
   73:     ok = fprof:stop(kill),
   74:     %%
   75:     TS0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
   76:     R0 = fprof:apply(fun seq/3, [Start, Stop, Succ], [{file, TraceFile}]),
   77:     TS1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
   78:     R = seq(Start, Stop, Succ),
   79:     TS2 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
   80:     ok = fprof:profile(file, TraceFile),
   81:     ok = fprof:analyse(),
   82:     ok = fprof:analyse(dest, AnalysisFile),
   83:     ok = fprof:stop(),
   84:     R = R0,
   85:     %%
   86:     {ok, [T, P]} = parse(AnalysisFile),
   87:     io:format("~p~n~n~p~n", [P, ets:tab2list(T)]),
   88:     ok = (catch verify(T, P)),
   89:     Proc = pid_to_list(self()),
   90:     case P of
   91:         [{analysis_options, _},
   92:          [{totals, _, Acc, _}],
   93:          [{Proc, _, undefined, _} | _]] ->
   94:             ok
   95:     end,
   96:     %%
   97:     check_own_and_acc(TraceFile,AnalysisFile),
   98:     %%
   99:     ets:delete(T),
  100:     file:delete(TraceFile),
  101:     file:delete(AnalysisFile),
  102:     Acc1 = TS1 - TS0,
  103:     Acc2 = TS2 - TS1,
  104:     io:format("ts:~w, fprof:~w, bare:~w.~n", [Acc, Acc1, Acc2]),
  105:     {comment, io_lib:format("~p times slower", [divide(Acc1,Acc2)])}.
  106: 
  107: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
  108: 
  109: %% Tests a tail recursive variant of lists:seq/3
  110: tail_seq(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  111:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  112:     TraceFile = filename:join(PrivDir,
  113:                               ?MODULE_STRING"_tail_seq.trace"),
  114:     AnalysisFile = filename:join(PrivDir,
  115:                                  ?MODULE_STRING"_tail_seq.analysis"),
  116:     Start = 1,
  117:     Stop = 1000,
  118:     Succ = fun (X) -> X + 1 end,
  119:     ok = fprof:stop(kill),
  120:     %%
  121:     TS0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  122:     R = seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ),
  123:     TS1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  124:     %%
  125:     R1 = fprof:apply(fun seq_r/3, [Start, Stop, Succ],
  126:                      [{file, TraceFile}]),
  127:     TS2 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  128:     ok = fprof:profile([{file,TraceFile}]),
  129:     ok = fprof:analyse(),
  130:     ok = fprof:analyse(dest, AnalysisFile),
  131:     ok = fprof:stop(),
  132:     R = R1,
  133:     %%
  134:     {ok, [T, P]} = parse(AnalysisFile),
  135:     io:format("~p~n~n~p~n", [P, ets:tab2list(T)]),
  136:     ok = verify(T, P),
  137:     Proc = pid_to_list(self()),
  138:     case P of
  139:         [{analysis_options, _},
  140:          [{totals, _, Acc, _}],
  141:          [{Proc, _, undefined, _} | _]] ->
  142:             ok
  143:     end,
  144:     %%
  145:     check_own_and_acc(TraceFile,AnalysisFile),
  146:     %%
  147:     ets:delete(T),
  148:     file:delete(TraceFile),
  149:     file:delete(AnalysisFile),
  150:     Acc1 = TS1 - TS0,
  151:     Acc2 = TS2 - TS1,
  152:     io:format("ts:~w, fprof:~w, bare:~w.~n", [Acc, Acc2, Acc1]),
  153:     {comment, io_lib:format("~p times slower", [divide(Acc2,Acc1)])}.
  154: 
  155: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
  156: 
  157: %% Tests the create_file_slow benchmark.
  158: create_file_slow(Config) ->
  159:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  160:     TraceFile = filename:join(PrivDir,
  161:                               ?MODULE_STRING"_create_file_slow.trace"),
  162:     AnalysisFile = filename:join(PrivDir,
  163:                                  ?MODULE_STRING"_create_file_slow.analysis"),
  164:     DataFile = filename:join(PrivDir,
  165:                              ?MODULE_STRING"_create_file_slow.data"),
  166:     ok = fprof:stop(kill),
  167:     %%
  168:     TS0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  169:     ok = create_file_slow(DataFile, 1024),
  170:     TS1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  171:     %%
  172:     ok = file:delete(DataFile),
  173:     TS2 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  174:     ok = fprof:apply(?MODULE, create_file_slow, [DataFile, 1024],
  175:                      [{file, TraceFile}]),
  176:     TS3 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  177:     ok = fprof:profile(file, TraceFile),
  178:     ok = fprof:analyse(),
  179:     ok = fprof:analyse(dest, AnalysisFile),
  180:     ok = fprof:stop(),
  181:     %%
  182:     {ok, [T, P]} = parse(AnalysisFile),
  183:     io:format("~p~n~n~p~n", [P, ets:tab2list(T)]),
  184:     ok = verify(T, P),
  185:     Proc = pid_to_list(self()),
  186:     case P of
  187:         [{analysis_options, _},
  188:          [{totals, _, Acc, _}],
  189:          [{Proc, _, undefined, _} | _]] ->
  190:             ok
  191:     end,
  192:     %%
  193:     check_own_and_acc(TraceFile,AnalysisFile),
  194:     %%
  195:     ets:delete(T),
  196:     file:delete(DataFile),
  197:     file:delete(TraceFile),
  198:     file:delete(AnalysisFile),
  199:     Acc1 = TS1 - TS0,
  200:     Acc3 = TS3 - TS2,
  201:     io:format("ts:~w, fprof:~w, bare:~w.~n", [Acc, Acc3, Acc1]),
  202:     {comment, io_lib:format("~p times slower", [divide(Acc3,Acc1)])}.
  203: 
  204: 
  205: 
  206: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
  207: 
  208: %% Tests process spawn
  209: spawn_simple(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  210:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  211:     TraceFile = filename:join(PrivDir,
  212:                               ?MODULE_STRING"_spawn_simple.trace"),
  213:     AnalysisFile = filename:join(PrivDir,
  214:                                  ?MODULE_STRING"_spawn_simple.analysis"),
  215:     Start = 1,
  216:     Stop = 1000,
  217:     Succ = fun (X) -> X + 1 end,
  218:     ok = fprof:stop(kill),
  219:     %%
  220:     TS0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  221:     {{_, R1}, {_, R2}} = spawn_simple_test(Start, Stop, Succ),
  222:     TS1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  223:     %%
  224:     ok = fprof:trace(start, TraceFile),
  225:     {{P1, R3}, {P2, R4}} = spawn_simple_test(Start, Stop, Succ),
  226:     ok = fprof:trace(stop),
  227:     TS2 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  228:     ok = fprof:profile(file, TraceFile),
  229:     ok = fprof:analyse(),
  230:     ok = fprof:analyse(dest, AnalysisFile),
  231:     ok = fprof:stop(),
  232:     R1 = R3,
  233:     R2 = R4,
  234:     %%
  235:     {ok, [T, P]} = parse(AnalysisFile),
  236:     io:format("~p~n~n~p~n", [P, ets:tab2list(T)]),
  237:     ok = verify(T, P),
  238:     Proc1 = pid_to_list(P1),
  239:     Proc2 = pid_to_list(P2),
  240:     Proc0 = pid_to_list(self()),
  241:     io:format("~p~n ~p ~p ~p~n", [P, Proc0, Proc1, Proc2]),
  242:     [{analysis_options, _}, [{totals, _, Acc, _}] | Procs] = P,
  243:     [[{Proc0, _, undefined, _} | _]] = lists:filter(
  244:                                          fun ([Pt | _]) when element(1, Pt) == Proc0 -> true;
  245:                                              (_) -> false
  246:                                          end, Procs),
  247:     [[{Proc1, _, undefined, _},
  248:       {spawned_by, Proc0},
  249:       {spawned_as, {erlang, apply, ["#Fun"++_, []]}},
  250:       {initial_calls, [{erlang, apply, 2},
  251:                        {?MODULE, '-spawn_simple_test/3-fun-0-', 4}]}
  252:       | _]] = lists:filter(fun ([Pt | _]) when element(1, Pt) == Proc1 -> true;
  253:                                (_) -> false
  254:                            end, Procs),
  255:     [[{Proc2, _, undefined, _},
  256:       {spawned_by, Proc0},
  257:       {spawned_as, {erlang, apply, ["#Fun"++_, []]}},
  258:       {initial_calls, [{erlang, apply, 2},
  259:                        {?MODULE, '-spawn_simple_test/3-fun-1-', 4}]}
  260:       | _]] = lists:filter(fun ([Pt | _]) when element(1, Pt) == Proc2 -> true;
  261:                                (_) -> false
  262:                            end, Procs),
  263:     3 = length(Procs),
  264:     R1 = lists:reverse(R2),
  265:     %%
  266:     check_own_and_acc(TraceFile,AnalysisFile),
  267:     %%
  268:     ets:delete(T),
  269:     file:delete(TraceFile),
  270:     file:delete(AnalysisFile),
  271:     Acc1 = TS1 - TS0,
  272:     Acc2 = TS2 - TS1,
  273:     io:format("ts:~w, fprof:~w, bare:~w.~n", [Acc, Acc2, Acc1]),
  274:     {comment, io_lib:format("~p times slower", [divide(Acc2,Acc1)])}.
  275: 
  276: 
  277: spawn_simple_test(Start, Stop, Succ) ->
  278:     Parent = self(),
  279:     Seq = spawn_link(fun() ->
  280:                              Parent ! {self(), seq(Start, Stop, Succ)}
  281:                      end),
  282: 
  283:     SeqR = spawn_link(fun() ->
  284:                               Parent ! {self(), seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ)}
  285:                       end),
  286:     receive
  287:         {Seq, SeqResult} ->
  288:             receive
  289:                 {SeqR, SeqRResult} ->
  290:                     {{Seq, SeqResult}, {SeqR, SeqRResult}}
  291:             end
  292:     end.
  293: 
  294: 
  295: 
  296: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
  297: 
  298: %% Tests a tail recursive variant of lists:seq/3
  299: %% with immediate trace to profile
  300: imm_tail_seq(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  301:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  302:     AnalysisFile = filename:join(PrivDir,
  303:                                  ?MODULE_STRING"_imm_tail_seq.analysis"),
  304:     Start = 1,
  305:     Stop = 1000,
  306:     Succ = fun (X) -> X + 1 end,
  307:     ok = fprof:stop(kill),
  308:     catch eprof:stop(),
  309:     %%
  310:     TS0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  311:     R0 = seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ),
  312:     TS1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  313:     %%
  314:     profiling = eprof:start_profiling([self()]),
  315:     TS2 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  316:     R2 = seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ),
  317:     TS3 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  318:     profiling_stopped = eprof:stop_profiling(),
  319:     R2 = R0,
  320:     %%
  321:     eprof:analyze(),
  322:     stopped = eprof:stop(),
  323:     %%
  324:     {ok, Tracer} = fprof:profile(start),
  325:     ok = fprof:trace([start, {tracer, Tracer}]),
  326:     TS4 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  327:     R4 = seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ),
  328:     TS5 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  329:     ok = fprof:trace(stop),
  330:     ok = fprof:analyse(),
  331:     ok = fprof:analyse(dest, AnalysisFile),
  332:     ok = fprof:stop(),
  333:     R4 = R0,
  334:     %%
  335:     {ok, [T, P]} = parse(AnalysisFile),
  336:     io:format("~p~n~n~p~n", [P, ets:tab2list(T)]),
  337:     ok = verify(T, P),
  338:     Proc = pid_to_list(self()),
  339:     case P of
  340:         [{analysis_options, _},
  341:          [{totals, _, Acc, _}],
  342:          [{Proc, _, undefined, _} | _]] -> ok
  343:     end,
  344:     %%
  345:     ets:delete(T),
  346:     file:delete(AnalysisFile),
  347:     Acc1 = TS1 - TS0,
  348:     Acc3 = TS3 - TS2,
  349:     Acc5 = TS5 - TS4,
  350:     io:format("~p (plain), ~p (eprof), ~p (fprof), ~p (cpu)~n",
  351:               [Acc1/1000, Acc3/1000, Acc5/1000, Acc/1000]),
  352:     {comment, io_lib:format("~p/~p (fprof/eprof) times slower", 
  353:                             [divide(Acc5,Acc1), divide(Acc3,Acc1)])}.
  354: 
  355: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
  356: 
  357: %% Tests a tail recursive variant of lists:seq/3
  358: %% with immediate trace to profile
  359: imm_create_file_slow(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  360:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  361:     DataFile = filename:join(PrivDir,
  362:                              ?MODULE_STRING"_imm_create_file_slow.data"),
  363:     AnalysisFile = filename:join(PrivDir,
  364:                                  ?MODULE_STRING"_imm_create_file_slow.analysis"),
  365:     ok = fprof:stop(kill),
  366:     %%
  367:     TS0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  368:     ok = create_file_slow(DataFile, 1024),
  369:     TS1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  370:     ok = file:delete(DataFile),
  371:     %%
  372:     {ok, Tracer} = fprof:profile(start),
  373:     TS2 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  374:     ok = fprof:apply(?MODULE, create_file_slow, [DataFile, 1024],
  375:                      [{tracer, Tracer}, continue]),
  376:     TS3 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  377:     ok = fprof:profile(stop),
  378:     ok = fprof:analyse(),
  379:     ok = fprof:analyse(dest, AnalysisFile),
  380:     ok = fprof:stop(),
  381:     %%
  382:     {ok, [T, P]} = parse(AnalysisFile),
  383:     io:format("~p~n~n~p~n", [P, ets:tab2list(T)]),
  384:     ok = verify(T, P),
  385:     Proc = pid_to_list(self()),
  386:     case P of
  387:         [{analysis_options, _},
  388:          [{totals, _, Acc, _}],
  389:          [{Proc, _, undefined, _} | _]] ->
  390:             ok
  391:     end,
  392:     %%
  393:     ets:delete(T),
  394:     file:delete(DataFile),
  395:     file:delete(AnalysisFile),
  396:     Acc1 = TS1 - TS0,
  397:     Acc3 = TS3 - TS2,
  398:     io:format("ts:~w, fprof:~w, bare:~w.~n", [Acc, Acc3, Acc1]),
  399:     {comment, io_lib:format("~p times slower", [divide(Acc3,Acc1)])}.
  400: 
  401: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
  402: 
  403: %% Tests to compile a small source file with immediate trace to profile
  404: imm_compile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  405:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 20}),
  406:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  407:     SourceFile = filename:join(DataDir, "foo.erl"),
  408:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  409:     AnalysisFile = filename:join(PrivDir,
  410:                                  ?MODULE_STRING"_imm_compile.analysis"),
  411:     ok = fprof:stop(kill),
  412:     catch eprof:stop(),
  413:     %%
  414:     {ok, foo, _} = compile:file(SourceFile, [binary]),
  415:     TS0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  416:     {ok, foo, _} = compile:file(SourceFile, [binary]),
  417:     TS1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  418:     %%
  419:     profiling = eprof:start_profiling([self()]),
  420:     TS2 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  421:     {ok, foo, _} = compile:file(SourceFile, [binary]),
  422:     TS3 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  423:     profiling_stopped = eprof:stop_profiling(),
  424:     %%
  425:     eprof:analyze(),
  426:     stopped = eprof:stop(),
  427:     %%
  428:     {ok, Tracer} = fprof:profile(start),
  429:     ok = fprof:trace([start, {tracer, Tracer}]),
  430:     TS4 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  431:     {ok, foo, _} = compile:file(SourceFile, [binary]),
  432:     TS5 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  433:     ok = fprof:trace(stop),
  434:     %%
  435:     io:format("Analysing...~n"),
  436:     ok = fprof:analyse(dest, AnalysisFile),
  437:     ok = fprof:stop(),
  438:     %%
  439:     {ok, [T, P]} = parse(AnalysisFile),
  440:     io:format("~p~n", [P]),
  441:     Acc1 = TS1 - TS0,
  442:     Acc3 = TS3 - TS2,
  443:     Acc5 = TS5 - TS4,
  444:     io:format("Verifying...~n"),
  445:     ok = verify(T, P),
  446:     case P of
  447:         [{analysis_options, _},
  448:          [{totals, _, Acc, _}] | _] ->
  449:             ok
  450:     end,
  451:     %%
  452:     ets:delete(T),
  453:     file:delete(AnalysisFile),
  454:     io:format("~p (plain), ~p (eprof), ~p (fprof), ~p(cpu)~n",
  455:               [Acc1/1000, Acc3/1000, Acc5/1000, Acc/1000]),
  456:     {comment, io_lib:format("~p/~p (fprof/eprof) times slower", 
  457:                             [divide(Acc5,Acc1), divide(Acc3,Acc1)])}.
  458: 
  459: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
  460: 
  461: %% Tests the create_file_slow benchmark using cpu_time
  462: cpu_create_file_slow(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  463:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  464:     TraceFile =
  465:     filename:join(PrivDir, ?MODULE_STRING"_cpu_create_file_slow.trace"),
  466:     AnalysisFile =
  467:     filename:join(PrivDir, ?MODULE_STRING"_cpu_create_file_slow.analysis"),
  468:     DataFile =
  469:     filename:join(PrivDir, ?MODULE_STRING"_cpu_create_file_slow.data"),
  470:     ok = fprof:stop(kill),
  471:     %%
  472:     TS0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  473:     Result = (catch fprof:apply(?MODULE, create_file_slow,
  474:                                 [DataFile, 1024],
  475:                                 [{file, TraceFile}, cpu_time])),
  476:     TS1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  477:     TestResult =
  478:     case Result of
  479:         ok ->
  480:             ok = fprof:profile(file, TraceFile),
  481:             ok = fprof:analyse(),
  482:             ok = fprof:analyse(dest, AnalysisFile),
  483:             ok = fprof:stop(),
  484:             %%
  485:             {ok, [T, P]} = parse(AnalysisFile),
  486:             io:format("~p~n~n~p~n", [P, ets:tab2list(T)]),
  487:             try
  488:                 ok = verify(T, P)
  489:             catch throw:{negative,_Weird} ->
  490:                     io:format("Aborted as counter is negative because of bad cpu_time")
  491:             end,
  492:             Proc = pid_to_list(self()),
  493:             case P of
  494:                 [{analysis_options, _},
  495:                  [{totals, _, Acc, _}],
  496:                  [{Proc, _, undefined, _} | _]] ->
  497:                     ok
  498:             end,
  499:             %%
  500:             check_own_and_acc(TraceFile,AnalysisFile),
  501:             %%
  502:             ets:delete(T),
  503:             file:delete(DataFile),
  504:             file:delete(TraceFile),
  505:             file:delete(AnalysisFile),
  506:             Acc1 = TS1 - TS0,
  507:             io:format("cpu_ts:~w, fprof:~w~n", [Acc, Acc1]),
  508:             {comment, io_lib:format("~p% cpu utilization", [100*divide(Acc,Acc1)])};
  509:         {'EXIT', not_supported} ->
  510:             {skipped, "not_supported"};
  511:         _ ->
  512:             ct:fail(Result)
  513:     end,
  514:     TestResult.
  515: 
  516: 
  517: unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  518:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  519:     SourceFile = filename:join(DataDir, "fprof_unicode.erl"),
  520:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  521:     AnalysisFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "fprof_unicode.analysis"),
  522:     {ok, fprof_unicode} = compile:file(SourceFile, [{outdir, PrivDir}]),
  523:     true = code:add_path(PrivDir),
  524:     fprof:apply(fprof_unicode, t, []),
  525:     ok = fprof:profile(dump, AnalysisFile),
  526:     ok = fprof:analyse(dest, AnalysisFile).
  527: 
  528: parsify_maps(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  529:     Pid = self(),
  530:     Ref = make_ref(),
  531:     Port = hd(erlang:ports()),
  532:     Fun = fun () -> ok end,
  533:     M = #{pid => Pid, Pid => pid,
  534:           ref => Ref, Ref => ref,
  535:           port => Port, Port => port,
  536:           a_fun => Fun, Fun => a_fun},
  537:     io:format("M = ~p~n", [M]),
  538:     L = [{tuple, M}, M, #{my_map => M, M => my_map}],
  539:     PL = fprof:parsify(L),
  540:     [{tuple, PM}, PM, PMap] = PL,
  541:     #{my_map := PM, PM := my_map} = PMap,
  542:     io:format("PM = ~p~n", [PM]),
  543:     LPid = pid_to_list(Pid),
  544:     LRef = ref_to_list(Ref),
  545:     LPort = port_to_list(Port),
  546:     LFun = erlang:fun_to_list(Fun),
  547:     LPid = maps:get(pid, PM),
  548:     pid = maps:get(LPid, PM),
  549:     LRef = maps:get(ref, PM),
  550:     ref = maps:get(LRef, PM),
  551:     LPort = maps:get(port, PM),
  552:     port = maps:get(LPort, PM),
  553:     LFun = maps:get(a_fun, PM),
  554:     a_fun = maps:get(LFun, PM),
  555:     ok.
  556: 
  557: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
  558: %%% Functions to test
  559: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
  560: 
  561: 
  562: 
  563: %% Stack recursive seq
  564: seq(Stop, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  565:     [Stop];
  566: seq(Start, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  567:     [Start | seq(Succ(Start), Stop, Succ)].
  568: 
  569: 
  570: 
  571: %% Tail recursive seq, result list is reversed
  572: seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  573:     seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ, []).
  574: 
  575: seq_r(Stop, Stop, _, R) ->
  576:     [Stop | R];
  577: seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ, R) ->
  578:     seq_r(Succ(Start), Stop, Succ, [Start | R]).
  579: 
  580: 
  581: 
  582: create_file_slow(Name, N) when is_integer(N), N >= 0 ->
  583:     {ok, FD} = 
  584:     file:open(Name, [raw, write, binary]),
  585:     if N > 256 ->
  586:            ok = file:write(FD,
  587:                            lists:map(fun (X) -> <<X:32/unsigned>> end,
  588:                                      lists:seq(0, 255))),
  589:            ok = create_file_slow(FD, 256, N);
  590:        true ->
  591:            ok = create_file_slow(FD, 0, N)
  592:     end,
  593:     ok = file:close(FD).
  594: 
  595: create_file_slow(_FD, M, M) ->
  596:     ok;
  597: create_file_slow(FD, M, N) ->
  598:     ok = file:write(FD, <<M:32/unsigned>>),
  599:     create_file_slow(FD, M+1, N).
  600: 
  601: 
  602: 
  603: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
  604: %%% Profile verification functions
  605: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
  606: 
  607: 
  608: verify(Tab, [{analysis_options, _},
  609:              [{totals, Cnt, Acc, Own} | _] | Processes]) ->
  610:     Processes_1 = 
  611:     lists:map(
  612:       fun ([{Proc, Cnt_P, undefined, Own_P} | _]) ->
  613:               case sum_process(Tab, Proc) of
  614:                   {Proc, Cnt_P, Acc_P, Own_P} = Clocks
  615:                     when Acc_P >= Own_P ->
  616:                       Clocks;
  617:                   {_, _, Acc_p, _} = Weird when Acc_p < 0 ->
  618:                       throw({negative, Weird});
  619:                   Weird ->
  620:                       throw({error, [?MODULE, ?LINE, Weird]})
  621:               end
  622:       end,
  623:       Processes),
  624:     case lists:foldl(
  625:            fun ({_, Cnt_P2, Acc_P2, Own_P2},
  626:                 {totals, Cnt_T, Acc_T, Own_T}) ->
  627:                    {totals, Cnt_P2+Cnt_T, Acc_P2+Acc_T, Own_P2+Own_T}
  628:            end,
  629:            {totals, 0, 0, 0},
  630:            Processes_1) of
  631:         {totals, Cnt, Acc_T, Own} when Acc_T >= Acc ->
  632:             ok;
  633:         Weird ->
  634:             throw({error, [?MODULE, ?LINE, Weird]})
  635:     end.
  636: 
  637: 
  638: sum_process(Tab, Proc) ->
  639:     ets_select_fold(
  640:       Tab, [{{{Proc, '_'}, '_'}, [], ['$_']}], 100,
  641:       fun ({{P, MFA}, {Callers, {MFA, Cnt, Acc, Own}, Called}},
  642:            {P, Cnt_P, Acc_P, Own_P}) when P == Proc ->
  643:               ok = verify_callers(Tab, Proc, MFA, Callers),
  644:               ok = verify_called(Tab, Proc, MFA, Called),
  645:               {P, Cnt+Cnt_P, Acc+Acc_P, Own+Own_P};
  646:           (Weird, Clocks) ->
  647:               throw({error, [?MODULE, ?LINE, Weird, Clocks]})
  648:       end,
  649:       {Proc, 0, 0, 0}).
  650: 
  651: verify_callers(_, _, _, []) ->
  652:     ok;
  653: verify_callers(Tab, Proc, MFA, [{Caller, Cnt, Acc, Own} | Tail]) ->
  654:     Id = {Proc, Caller},
  655:     case ets:lookup(Tab, Id) of
  656:         [{Id, {_, {Caller, _, _, _}, Called}}] ->
  657:             case lists:keysearch(MFA, 1, Called) of
  658:                 {value, {MFA, Cnt, Acc, Own}} ->
  659:                     verify_callers(Tab, Proc, MFA, Tail);
  660:                 false ->
  661:                     throw({error, [?MODULE, ?LINE, MFA, Id]})
  662:             end;
  663:         Weird ->
  664:             throw({error, [?MODULE, ?LINE, Weird]})
  665:     end.
  666: 
  667: verify_called(_, _, _, []) ->
  668:     ok;
  669: verify_called(Tab, Proc, MFA, [{Called, Cnt, Acc, Own} | Tail]) ->
  670:     Id = {Proc, Called},
  671:     case ets:lookup(Tab, Id) of
  672:         [{Id, {Callers, {Called, _, _, _}, _}}] ->
  673:             case lists:keysearch(MFA, 1, Callers) of
  674:                 {value, {MFA, Cnt, Acc, Own}} ->
  675:                     verify_called(Tab, Proc, MFA, Tail);
  676:                 false ->
  677:                     throw({error, [?MODULE, ?LINE, MFA, Id]})
  678:             end;
  679:         Weird ->
  680:             throw({error, [?MODULE, ?LINE, Weird]})
  681:     end.
  682: 
  683: 
  684: 
  685: %% Parse a analysis file and return an Ets table with all function entries, 
  686: %% and a list of process entries. Checks the concistency of the function
  687: %% entries when they are read.
  688: parse(Filename) ->
  689:     case file:open(Filename, [read]) of
  690:         {ok, FD} ->
  691:             Result = parse_stream(FD),
  692:             file:close(FD),
  693:             Result;
  694:         Error ->
  695:             Error
  696:     end.
  697: 
  698: parse_stream(FD) ->
  699:     Tab = ets:new(fprof_SUITE, []),
  700:     parse_stream(FD, Tab, [], void).
  701: 
  702: parse_stream(FD, Tab, R, Proc) ->
  703:     case catch io:read(FD, '') of
  704:         {'EXIT', _} ->
  705:             {error, [?MODULE, ?LINE]};
  706:         {ok, Term} ->
  707:             case parse_term(Term) of
  708:                 {ok, {analysis_options, _} = Term_1}
  709:                   when Proc == void ->
  710:                     parse_stream(FD, Tab, [Term_1 | R], analysis_options);
  711:                 {ok, [{totals, _, _, _} | _] = Term_1}
  712:                   when Proc == analysis_options ->
  713:                     parse_stream(FD, Tab, [Term_1 | R], totals);
  714:                 {ok, [{P, _, _, _} | _] = Term_1} ->
  715:                     parse_stream(FD, Tab, [Term_1 | R], P);
  716:                 {ok, {_Callers, {MFA, _, _, _}, _Called} = Term_1}
  717:                   when Proc == totals; is_list(Proc) ->
  718:                     ets:insert(Tab, {{Proc, MFA}, Term_1}),
  719:                     parse_stream(FD, Tab, R, Proc);
  720:                 {ok, Term_1} ->
  721:                     {error, [?MODULE, ?LINE, Term_1]};
  722:                 E ->
  723:                     E
  724:             end;
  725:         eof ->
  726:             {ok, [Tab, lists:reverse(R)]};
  727:         Error ->
  728:             Error
  729:     end.
  730: 
  731: parse_term({Callers, Func, Called})
  732:   when is_list(Callers), is_list(Called) ->
  733:     Callers_1 = lists:map(fun parse_clocks/1, Callers),
  734:     Func_1 = parse_clocks(Func),
  735:     Called_1 = lists:map(fun parse_clocks/1, Called),
  736:     Result = {Callers_1, Func_1, Called_1},
  737:     case chk_invariant(Result) of
  738:         ok ->
  739:             {ok, Result};
  740:         Error ->
  741:             Error
  742:     end;
  743: parse_term([{_, _, _, _} = Clocks | Tail]) ->
  744:     {ok, [parse_clocks(Clocks) | Tail]};
  745: parse_term(Term) ->
  746:     {ok, Term}.
  747: 
  748: parse_clocks({MFA, Cnt, undefined, Own}) ->
  749:     {MFA, Cnt, undefined, round(Own*1000)};
  750: parse_clocks({MFA, Cnt, Acc, Own}) ->
  751:     {MFA, Cnt, round(Acc*1000), round(Own*1000)};
  752: parse_clocks(Clocks) ->
  753:     Clocks.
  754: 
  755: 
  756: 
  757: chk_invariant({Callers, {MFA, Cnt, Acc, Own}, Called} = Term) ->
  758:     {_, Callers_Cnt, Callers_Acc, Callers_Own} = Callers_Sum = sum(Callers),
  759:     %    {_, Called_Cnt, Called_Acc, Called_Own} = Called_Sum = sum(Called),
  760:     case {MFA, 
  761:           lists:keymember(suspend, 1, Callers),
  762:           lists:keymember(garbage_collect, 1, Callers),
  763:           Called} of
  764:         {suspend, false, _, []} ->
  765:             ok;
  766:         {suspend, _, _, _} = Weird ->
  767:             {error, [?MODULE, ?LINE, Weird, Term]};
  768:         {garbage_collect, false, false, []} ->
  769:             ok;
  770:         {garbage_collect, false, false, [{suspend, _, _, _}]} ->
  771:             ok;
  772:         {garbage_collect, _, _, _} = Weird ->
  773:             {error, [?MODULE, ?LINE, Weird, Term]};
  774:         {undefined, false, false, _}
  775:           when Callers == [], Cnt == 0, Acc == 0, Own == 0 ->
  776:             ok;
  777:         {undefined, _, _, _} = Weird ->
  778:             {error, [?MODULE, ?LINE, Weird, Term]};
  779:         {_, _, _, _} ->
  780:             case chk_self_call(Term) of
  781:                 true when Callers_Cnt /= Cnt; Callers_Acc /= Acc;
  782:                           Callers_Own /= Own ->
  783:                     {error, [?MODULE, ?LINE, Callers_Sum, Term]};
  784:                 % 		true when Called_Acc + Own /= Acc ->
  785:                 % 		    io:format("WARNING: ~p:~p, ~p, ~p.~n",
  786:                 % 			      [?MODULE, ?LINE, Term, Called_Sum]),
  787:                 % 		    {error, [?MODULE, ?LINE, Term, Called_Sum]};
  788:                 % 		    ok;
  789:                 true ->
  790:                     ok;
  791:                 false ->
  792:                     {error, [?MODULE, ?LINE, Term]}
  793:             end
  794:     end.
  795: 
  796: ts_sub({A, B, C}, {A0, B0, C0}) ->
  797:     ((A - A0)*1000000000000 + (B - B0))*1000000 + C - C0.
  798: 
  799: sum(Funcs) ->
  800:     {sum, _Cnt, _Acc, _Own} = 
  801:     lists:foldl(
  802:       fun ({_, C1, A1, O1}, {sum, C2, A2, O2}) ->
  803:               {sum, C1+C2, A1+A2, O1+O2}
  804:       end,
  805:       {sum, 0, 0, 0},
  806:       Funcs).
  807: 
  808: chk_self_call({Callers, {MFA, _Cnt, _Acc, _Own}, Called}) ->
  809:     case lists:keysearch(MFA, 1, Callers) of
  810:         false ->
  811:             true;
  812:         {value, {MFA, C, 0, O}} ->
  813:             case lists:keysearch(MFA, 1, Called) of
  814:                 false ->
  815:                     false;
  816:                 {value, {MFA, C, 0, O}} ->
  817:                     true;
  818:                 {value, _} ->
  819:                     false
  820:             end;
  821:         {value, _} ->
  822:             false
  823:     end.
  824: 
  825: 
  826: 
  827: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
  828: %%% Fairly generic support functions
  829: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
  830: 
  831: 
  832: ets_select_fold(Table, MatchSpec, Limit, Fun, Acc) ->
  833:     ets:safe_fixtable(Table, true),
  834:     ets_select_fold_1(ets:select(Table, MatchSpec, Limit), Fun, Acc).
  835: 
  836: ets_select_fold_1('$end_of_table', _, Acc) ->
  837:     Acc;
  838: ets_select_fold_1({Matches, Continuation}, Fun, Acc) ->
  839:     ets_select_fold_1(ets:select(Continuation), 
  840:                       Fun,
  841:                       lists:foldl(Fun, Acc, Matches)).
  842: 
  843: 
  844: % ets_select_foreach(Table, MatchSpec, Limit, Fun) ->
  845: %     ets:safe_fixtable(Table, true),
  846: %     ets_select_foreach_1(ets:select(Table, MatchSpec, Limit), Fun).
  847: 
  848: % ets_select_foreach_1('$end_of_table', _) ->
  849: %     ok;
  850: % ets_select_foreach_1({Matches, Continuation}, Fun) ->
  851: %     lists:foreach(Fun, Matches),
  852: %     ets_select_foreach_1(ets:select(Continuation), Fun).
  853: 
  854: 
  855: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
  856: %%% Simple smulation of fprof used for checking own and acc times for
  857: %%% each function.
  858: %%% The function 'undefined' is ignored
  859: %%%---------------------------------------------------------------------
  860: 
  861: %% check_own_and_acc_traced(TraceFile, AnalysisFile) ->
  862: %%     check_own_and_acc(TraceFile, AnalysisFile, fun handle_trace_traced/2).
  863: 
  864: check_own_and_acc(TraceFile, AnalysisFile) ->
  865:     check_own_and_acc(TraceFile, AnalysisFile, fun handle_trace/2).
  866: 
  867: check_own_and_acc(TraceFile, AnalysisFile, HandlerFun) ->
  868:     dbg:trace_client(file,TraceFile,{HandlerFun,{init,self()}}),
  869:     receive {result,Result} -> 
  870:                 compare(Result,get_own_and_acc_from_analysis(AnalysisFile))
  871:     end.
  872: 
  873: %% handle_trace_traced(Trace, Msg) ->
  874: %%     io:format("handle_trace_traced(~p, ~p).", [Trace, Msg]),
  875: %%     handle_trace(Trace, Msg).
  876: 
  877: handle_trace(Trace,{init,Parent}) ->
  878:     ?dbg("~p",[start]),
  879:     ets:new(fprof_verify_tab,[named_table]),
  880:     handle_trace(Trace,Parent);
  881: handle_trace({trace_ts,Pid,in,MFA,TS},P) ->
  882:     ?dbg("~p",[{{in,Pid,MFA},get(Pid)}]),
  883:     case get(Pid) of
  884:         [suspend|[suspend|_]=NewStack] ->
  885:             T = ts_sub(TS,get({Pid,last_ts})),
  886:             update_acc(Pid,NewStack,T),
  887:             put(Pid,NewStack);
  888:         [suspend|NewStack] = Stack ->
  889:             T = ts_sub(TS,get({Pid,last_ts})),
  890:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T),
  891:             put(Pid,NewStack);
  892:         [] ->
  893:             put(Pid,[MFA]),
  894:             insert(Pid,MFA);
  895:         undefined ->
  896:             put(first_ts,TS),
  897:             put(Pid,[MFA]),
  898:             insert(Pid,MFA)
  899:     end,
  900:     put({Pid,last_ts},TS),
  901:     P;
  902: handle_trace({trace_ts,Pid,out,_MfaOrZero,TS},P) ->
  903:     ?dbg("~p",[{{out,Pid,_MfaOrZero},get(Pid)}]),
  904:     T = ts_sub(TS,get({Pid,last_ts})),
  905:     case get(Pid) of
  906:         [suspend|S] = Stack ->
  907:             update_acc(Pid,S,T),
  908:             put(Pid,[suspend|Stack]);
  909:         [MFA|_] = Stack ->
  910:             insert(Pid,suspend),
  911:             update_own(Pid,MFA,T),
  912:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T),
  913:             put(Pid,[suspend|Stack]);
  914:         [] ->
  915:             insert(Pid,suspend),
  916:             put(Pid,[suspend])
  917:     end,
  918:     put({Pid,last_ts},TS),
  919:     P;
  920: handle_trace({trace_ts,Pid,call,MFA,{cp,Caller},TS},P) ->
  921:     ?dbg("~p",[{{call,Pid,MFA},get(Pid)}]),
  922:     T = ts_sub(TS,get({Pid,last_ts})),
  923:     case get(Pid) of
  924:         [MFA|_] = Stack ->
  925:             %% recursive
  926:             update_own(Pid,MFA,T),
  927:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T);
  928:         [CallingMFA|_] = Stack when Caller==undefined ->
  929:             insert(Pid,MFA),
  930:             update_own(Pid,CallingMFA,T),
  931:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T),
  932:             put(Pid,[MFA|Stack]);
  933:         [] when Caller==undefined ->
  934:             insert(Pid,MFA),
  935:             insert(Pid,MFA),
  936:             put(Pid,[MFA]);
  937:         Stack0 ->
  938:             Stack = [CallingMFA|_] = insert_caller(Caller,Stack0,[]),
  939:             insert(Pid,MFA),
  940:             insert(Pid,Caller),
  941:             update_own(Pid,CallingMFA,T),
  942:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T),
  943:             put(Pid,[MFA|Stack])
  944:     end,
  945:     put({Pid,last_ts},TS),
  946:     P;
  947: handle_trace({trace_ts,Pid,return_to,MFA,TS},P) ->
  948:     ?dbg("~p",[{{return_to,Pid,MFA},get(Pid)}]),
  949:     T = ts_sub(TS,get({Pid,last_ts})),
  950:     case get(Pid) of
  951:         [MFA|_] = Stack ->
  952:             %% recursive
  953:             update_own(Pid,MFA,T),
  954:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T),
  955:             put(Pid,Stack);
  956:         [ReturnFromMFA,MFA|RestOfStack] = Stack ->
  957:             update_own(Pid,ReturnFromMFA,T),
  958:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T),
  959:             put(Pid,[MFA|RestOfStack]);
  960:         [ReturnFromMFA|RestOfStack] = Stack ->
  961:             update_own(Pid,ReturnFromMFA,T),
  962:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T),
  963:             case find_return_to(MFA,RestOfStack) of
  964:                 [] when MFA==undefined ->
  965:                     put(Pid,[]);
  966:                 [] ->
  967:                     insert(Pid,MFA),
  968:                     put(Pid,[MFA]);
  969:                 NewStack ->
  970:                     put(Pid,NewStack)
  971:             end
  972:     end,
  973:     put({Pid,last_ts},TS),
  974:     P;
  975: handle_trace({trace_ts,Pid,gc_minor_start,_,TS},P) ->
  976:     ?dbg("~p",[{{gc_minor_start,Pid},get(Pid)}]),
  977:     case get(Pid) of
  978:         [suspend|_] = Stack ->
  979:             T = ts_sub(TS,get({Pid,last_ts})),
  980:             insert(Pid,garbage_collect),
  981:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T),
  982:             put(Pid,[garbage_collect|Stack]);
  983:         [CallingMFA|_] = Stack ->
  984:             T = ts_sub(TS,get({Pid,last_ts})),
  985:             insert(Pid,garbage_collect),
  986:             update_own(Pid,CallingMFA,T),
  987:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T),
  988:             put(Pid,[garbage_collect|Stack]);
  989:         undefined ->
  990:             put(first_ts,TS),
  991:             put(Pid,[garbage_collect]),
  992:             insert(Pid,garbage_collect)
  993:     end,
  994:     put({Pid,last_ts},TS),
  995:     P;
  996: handle_trace({trace_ts,Pid,gc_major_start,_,TS},P) ->
  997:     ?dbg("~p",[{{gc_minor_start,Pid},get(Pid)}]),
  998:     case get(Pid) of
  999:         [suspend|_] = Stack ->
 1000:             T = ts_sub(TS,get({Pid,last_ts})),
 1001:             insert(Pid,garbage_collect),
 1002:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T),
 1003:             put(Pid,[garbage_collect|Stack]);
 1004:         [CallingMFA|_] = Stack ->
 1005:             T = ts_sub(TS,get({Pid,last_ts})),
 1006:             insert(Pid,garbage_collect),
 1007:             update_own(Pid,CallingMFA,T),
 1008:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T),
 1009:             put(Pid,[garbage_collect|Stack]);
 1010:         undefined ->
 1011:             put(first_ts,TS),
 1012:             put(Pid,[garbage_collect]),
 1013:             insert(Pid,garbage_collect)
 1014:     end,
 1015:     put({Pid,last_ts},TS),
 1016:     P;
 1017: handle_trace({trace_ts,Pid,gc_minor_end,_,TS},P) ->
 1018:     ?dbg("~p",[{{gc_minor_end,Pid},get(Pid)}]),
 1019:     T = ts_sub(TS,get({Pid,last_ts})),
 1020:     case get(Pid) of
 1021:         [garbage_collect|RestOfStack] = Stack ->
 1022:             update_own(Pid,garbage_collect,T),
 1023:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T),
 1024:             put(Pid,RestOfStack)
 1025:     end,
 1026:     put({Pid,last_ts},TS),
 1027:     P;
 1028: handle_trace({trace_ts,Pid,gc_major_end,_,TS},P) ->
 1029:     ?dbg("~p",[{{gc_major_end,Pid},get(Pid)}]),
 1030:     T = ts_sub(TS,get({Pid,last_ts})),
 1031:     case get(Pid) of
 1032:         [garbage_collect|RestOfStack] = Stack ->
 1033:             update_own(Pid,garbage_collect,T),
 1034:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T),
 1035:             put(Pid,RestOfStack)
 1036:     end,
 1037:     put({Pid,last_ts},TS),
 1038:     P;
 1039: handle_trace({trace_ts,Pid,spawn,NewPid,{M,F,Args},TS},P) ->
 1040:     MFA = {M,F,length(Args)},
 1041:     ?dbg("~p",[{{spawn,Pid,NewPid,MFA},get(Pid)}]),
 1042:     T = ts_sub(TS,get({Pid,last_ts})),
 1043:     case get(NewPid) of
 1044:         undefined ->
 1045:             put({NewPid,last_ts},TS),
 1046:             put(NewPid,[suspend,MFA]),
 1047:             insert(NewPid,suspend),
 1048:             insert(NewPid,MFA);
 1049:         _Else ->
 1050:             ok
 1051:     end,
 1052:     case get(Pid) of
 1053:         [SpawningMFA|_] = Stack ->
 1054:             update_own(Pid,SpawningMFA,T),
 1055:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T)
 1056:     end,
 1057:     put({Pid,last_ts},TS),
 1058:     P;
 1059: handle_trace({trace_ts,NewPid,spawned,Pid,{M,F,Args},TS},P) ->
 1060:     MFA = {M,F,length(Args)},
 1061:     ?dbg("~p",[{{spawned,NewPid,Pid,MFA},get(NewPid)}]),
 1062:     case get(NewPid) of
 1063:         undefined ->
 1064:             put({NewPid,last_ts},TS),
 1065:             put(NewPid,[suspend,MFA]),
 1066:             insert(NewPid,suspend),
 1067:             insert(NewPid,MFA);
 1068:         _Else ->
 1069:             ok
 1070:     end,
 1071:     P;
 1072: handle_trace({trace_ts,Pid,exit,_Reason,TS},P) ->
 1073:     ?dbg("~p",[{{exit,Pid,_Reason},get(Pid)}]),
 1074:     T = ts_sub(TS,get({Pid,last_ts})),
 1075:     case get(Pid) of
 1076:         [DyingMFA|_] = Stack ->
 1077:             update_own(Pid,DyingMFA,T),
 1078:             update_acc(Pid,Stack,T),
 1079:             put(Pid,[]);
 1080:         [] ->
 1081:             ok
 1082:     end,
 1083:     put({Pid,last_ts},TS),
 1084:     P;
 1085: handle_trace({trace_ts,_,Link,_,_},P) 
 1086:   when Link==link;
 1087:        Link==unlink;
 1088:        Link==getting_linked;
 1089:        Link==getting_unlinked ->
 1090:     P;
 1091: handle_trace(end_of_trace,P) ->
 1092:     ?dbg("~p",['end']),
 1093:     Result = ets:tab2list(fprof_verify_tab),
 1094:     {TotOwn,ProcOwns} = get_proc_owns(Result,[],0),
 1095:     TotAcc = ts_sub(get_last_ts(),get(first_ts)),
 1096:     P ! {result,[{totals,TotAcc,TotOwn}|ProcOwns]++Result},
 1097:     P;
 1098: handle_trace(Other,_P) ->
 1099:     ct:log("Got unexpected trace message: ~p",[Other]),
 1100:     exit({unexpected,Other}).
 1101: 
 1102: find_return_to(MFA,[MFA|_]=Stack) ->
 1103:     Stack;
 1104: find_return_to(MFA,[_|Stack]) ->
 1105:     find_return_to(MFA,Stack);
 1106: find_return_to(_MFA,[]) ->
 1107:     [].
 1108: 
 1109: insert_caller(MFA,[MFA|Rest],Result) ->
 1110:     lists:reverse(Result)++[MFA|Rest];
 1111: insert_caller(MFA,[Other|Rest],Result) ->
 1112:     insert_caller(MFA,Rest,[Other|Result]);
 1113: insert_caller(MFA,[],Result) ->
 1114:     lists:reverse([MFA|Result]).
 1115: 
 1116: insert(Pid,MFA) ->
 1117:     case ets:member(fprof_verify_tab,{Pid,MFA}) of
 1118:         false ->
 1119:             ets:insert(fprof_verify_tab,{{Pid,MFA},0,0});
 1120:         true ->
 1121:             ok
 1122:     end.
 1123: 
 1124: update_own(Pid,MFA,T) ->
 1125:     ets:update_counter(fprof_verify_tab,{Pid,MFA},{3,T}).
 1126: 
 1127: update_acc(Pid,[MFA|Rest],T) ->
 1128:     case lists:member(MFA,Rest) of
 1129:         true ->
 1130:             %% Only charge one time for recursive functions
 1131:             ok;
 1132:         false ->
 1133:             ets:update_counter(fprof_verify_tab,{Pid,MFA},{2,T})
 1134:     end,
 1135:     update_acc(Pid,Rest,T);
 1136: update_acc(_Pid,[],_T) ->
 1137:     ok.
 1138: 
 1139: 
 1140: get_last_ts() ->
 1141:     get_last_ts(get(),{0,0,0}).
 1142: get_last_ts([{{_,last_ts},TS}|Rest],Last) when TS>Last ->
 1143:     get_last_ts(Rest,TS);
 1144: get_last_ts([_|Rest],Last) ->
 1145:     get_last_ts(Rest,Last);
 1146: get_last_ts([],Last) ->
 1147:     Last.
 1148: 
 1149: get_proc_owns([{{Pid,_MFA},_Acc,Own}|Rest],Result,Sum) ->
 1150:     NewResult = 
 1151:     case lists:keysearch(Pid,1,Result) of
 1152:         {value,{Pid,undefined,PidOwn}} ->
 1153:             lists:keyreplace(Pid,1,Result,{Pid,undefined,PidOwn+Own});
 1154:         false ->
 1155:             [{Pid,undefined,Own}|Result]
 1156:     end,
 1157:     get_proc_owns(Rest,NewResult,Sum+Own);
 1158: get_proc_owns([],Result,Sum) ->
 1159:     {Sum,Result}.
 1160: 
 1161: 
 1162: compare([X|Rest],FprofResult) ->
 1163:     FprofResult1 = 
 1164:     case lists:member(X,FprofResult) of
 1165:         true ->
 1166:             ?dbg("~p",[X]),
 1167:             lists:delete(X,FprofResult);
 1168:         false ->
 1169:             case lists:keysearch(element(1,X),1,FprofResult) of
 1170:                 {value,Fprof} ->
 1171:                     put(compare_error,true),
 1172:                     io:format("Error: Different values\n"
 1173:                               "Fprof:     ~p\n"
 1174:                               "Simulator: ~p",[Fprof,X]),
 1175:                     lists:delete(Fprof,FprofResult);
 1176:                 false ->
 1177:                     put(compare_error,true),
 1178:                     io:format("Error: Missing in fprof: ~p",[X]),
 1179:                     FprofResult
 1180:             end
 1181:     end,
 1182:     compare(Rest,FprofResult1);
 1183: compare([],Rest) ->
 1184:     case {remove_undefined(Rest,[]),get(compare_error)} of
 1185:         {[],undefined} -> ok;
 1186:         {Error,_} ->
 1187:             case Error of
 1188:                 [] -> ok;
 1189:                 _ -> io:format("\nMissing in simulator results:\n~p\n",[Error])
 1190:             end,
 1191:             ct:fail({error,mismatch_between_simulator_and_fprof})
 1192:     end.
 1193: 
 1194: remove_undefined([{{_Pid,undefined},_,_}|Rest],Result) ->
 1195:     remove_undefined(Rest,Result);
 1196: remove_undefined([X|Rest],Result) ->
 1197:     remove_undefined(Rest,[X|Result]);
 1198: remove_undefined([],Result) ->
 1199:     Result.
 1200: 
 1201: get_own_and_acc_from_analysis(Log) ->
 1202:     case file:consult(Log) of
 1203:         {ok,[_Options,[{totals,_,TotAcc,TotOwn}]|Rest]} ->
 1204:             get_own_and_acc(undefined,Rest,
 1205:                             [{totals,m1000(TotAcc),m1000(TotOwn)}]);
 1206:         Error ->
 1207:             exit({error,{cant_open,Log,Error}})
 1208:     end.
 1209: 
 1210: get_own_and_acc(_,[[{PidStr,_,Acc,Own}|_]|Rest],Result) ->
 1211:     Pid = list_to_pid(PidStr),
 1212:     get_own_and_acc(Pid,Rest,[{Pid,m1000(Acc),m1000(Own)}|Result]);
 1213: get_own_and_acc(Pid,[{_Callers,{MFA,_,Acc,Own},_Called}|Rest],Result) ->
 1214:     get_own_and_acc(Pid,Rest,[{{Pid,MFA},m1000(Acc),m1000(Own)}|Result]);
 1215: get_own_and_acc(_,[],Result) ->
 1216:     lists:reverse(Result).
 1217: 
 1218: m1000(undefined) ->
 1219:     undefined;
 1220: m1000(X) ->
 1221:     round(X*1000).
 1222: 
 1223: divide(_,0) -> inf;
 1224: divide(A,B) -> A / B.
